com.flowpowered.react.collision.shape

Class CollisionShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.collision.shape.CollisionShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxShape, CapsuleShape, ConeShape, ConvexMeshShape, CylinderShape, SphereShape

    public abstract class CollisionShape
extends Object
    Represents the collision shape associated with a body that is used during the narrow-phase collision detection.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CollisionShape.CollisionShapeType
      An enumeration of the possible collision shape (box, sphere, cone and cylinder).

      • computeLocalInertiaTensor

        public abstract void computeLocalInertiaTensor(Matrix3x3 tensor,
                                               float mass)
        Computes the local inertia tensor of the collision shape for the mass. Stores the results in the passed matrix3x3.
        Parameters:
        tensor - The matrix3x3 in which the tensor should be stored
        mass - The mass of the shape
